1.0.name: wordpress/eshortcodes
1.0.description: eShortcodes is a framework to ease the end users experience with shortcodes. An extra meta box is added to the post/page edit screens with available shortcodes, and a form with the possible attributes. Hooks have been added for plugin developers to use. 2 examples have been included, gallery and content.
